findings.title: Improper Delegation Handling
findings.description: The delegate mechanism will only activate when the delegator calls the `delegate()` function, allowing $KENNEL to be used for double spending attack in an aspect of voting mechanism.

findings.title: Improper Reward Calculation (Duplicated LP Token)
findings.description: The $SMOY reward miscalculation can lead to an unfair $SMOY token distribution to the users.

findings.title: Improper Reward Calculation (BONUS_MULTIPLIER)
findings.description: Whenever the BONUS_MULTIPLIER variable is modified without updating the pending reward first, the reward of each pool will be incorrectly calculated.

findings.title: Improper Reward Calculation (smoyPerBlock)
findings.description: The `smoyPerBlock` variable is modified without updating the pending reward first, leading to incorrect calculation of each pool's reward.

findings.title: Improper Reward Calculation (_withUpdate)
findings.description: The $SMOY reward miscalculation can lead to an unfair $SMOY token distribution to the users due to incorrect calculation of rewards when `BONUS_MULTIPLIER` is modified without updating the pending reward first.

findings.title: Centralized Control of State Variable
findings.description: Critical state variables can be updated any time by the controlling authorities without notifying users.

findings.title: Design Flaw in massUpdatePools() Function
findings.description: The `massUpdatePools()` function will eventually be unusable due to excessive gas usage because it calls `updatePool()` for all added pools, even if they are disabled.

findings.title: Unchecked Deposit Fee Value
findings.description: The deposit() function uses the value of _amount parameter directly without validating the amount of the received token from the user.

findings.title: Insufficient Logging for Privileged Functions
findings.description: Privileged functions that are executable by the controlling parties are not logged properly by emitting events.

findings.title: Unsupported Design for Deflationary Token
findings.description: Business Logic Errors related to deflationary token design
